heroSection.mainBanner: We open non-stop 24/7 access to global market and foreign currency.
heroSection.learnBanner: Deposit 300$ and get MOTFX ACADEMY online course for free.
heroSection.depositBanner: You can deposit/withdraw very quickly using domestic banks.
heroSection.cryptoBanner: Opportunity to trade cryptocurrencies and all market opportunities at one place.

featureSection.title: Why
featureSection.description: We have established the first real Forex and stock trading broker in Mongolia and created a trading bridge for Mongolian traders that connects them directly to the global market, eliminating the need to use foreign brokers and export dollars
featureSection.lowCommissionDesc: Minimum Spread and Commission. Spread for Pro account starts from 0.00.
featureSection.fastestTradeDesc: Your trade will be executed in 15 milliseconds.
featureSection.easistDepoWithDesc: Use local banks to quickly top up your account and spend as quickly as possible
featureSection.cryptoDepoWithDesc: You can deposit and withdraw quickly using cryptocurrency.
featureSection.flexibleLeverageDesc: It is possible to trade by choosing leverage up to 1:500
featureSection.tradingOptionsDesc: From company stocks to foreign currencies, precious metals, oil, indices, cryptocurrencies, etc, there are 1000+ trading options.

liveAccounts.description: Are you a scalper or a swinger? Do you trade with bots or use EAs? Are you a beginner trader or an experienced pro trader? Either way, we offer trading accounts that suit your trading needs.

transactionSection.description: Fastest Deposit/Withdrawal possible using local bank and cryptocurrency.

platformSection.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s,

homeSpreadSection.title: Lowest spread and commission charges.
homeSpreadSection.desc: We provide customers with the lowest interest rate differential, known as the spread, and the lowest commission charges. This is made possible through direct execution of your orders in the real market, where major banks engage in interbank trading and lending, electronic order fulfillment, and credit liquidity provision.

tradePage.accountDesc: Be it Scalper, Day Trader, Swing Trader, Bot Trader, EA Trader, or Position Trader, we have suitable trading account options for you. If you are a Scalper, Day Trader, Bot Trader, or EA Trader who trades with high lots, the spread is low. Then choose our PRO account with a very low spread and low commission.
tradePage.marketDesc: We offer 2000+ FX Pairs, CFDs, Stocks, Stocks, Metals, Oil, Indices, Cryptocurrencies, etc. All trading options are available.
tradePage.priceDesc: MOTFX broker executes orders in 15 milliseconds through electronic order fulfillment agents connected to the interbank system, where major banks, funds, and traders of the world trade with each other, so it delivers the lowest possible interest rate difference and fees to its customers.

platformPage.mt5Desc: MetaTrader 5 is the world's most popular and easy-to-use trading platform for traders, allowing you to trade all types of financial instruments including forex, stocks, indices, bonds, and cryptocurrencies from a single account.
platformPage.cTraderDesc: cTrader is an innovative, easy to use interface and powerful platform designed for traders who want the fastest trade order execution, complete analysis of their trades.
platformPage.tradingHourDesc: Forex, stock, and crypto markets are continuously traded 24/7, and all around the world, so you can trade anywhere and anytime.
platformPage.demoAccountDesc: You can open a free DEMO account to test and practice our broker system and choose from all trading account types and platforms.

supportPage.contactUsDesc: We are always ready to help you. Let us know if you have any problems or questions or need to contact us. We will respond to you within 24 hours at the latest.
supportPage.partnerWithUsDesc: We are ready to cooperate with you if you can reach the public, have your audience, and can promote our broker's services and products to others. We will rate each customer you invite and share in the profits of the activity.

tradingAccounts.titleDesc: Depending on what type of trader you are, you can choose from the account types below
tradingAccounts.mt5ProDesc: The MT5 PRO account, offering very low spread and trading commission, is perfect for Day Traders, Scalpers, Bot Traders, and high-volume traders.
tradingAccounts.mt5StandardDesc: The MT5 STANDARD account is perfect for Swing Traders, Position Traders, or low-volume traders. It is a STANDARD account with no trading fees and low spreads.
tradingAccounts.ctraderProDesc: A PRO account with very low spreads and low trading commision is available for users of the cTrader platform

accountTable.desc: Depending on what type of trader you are, you can choose from the account types below

marketSection.fxDesc: The Forex stock market is the largest financial market in the world with an average daily turnover of $6 trillion. Forex trading is the process of buying and selling currency pairs to profit from changes in exchange rates, and the most commonly traded currency pairs include EUR/USD, USD/JPY, and GBP/USD
marketSection.cfdDesc: CFD stands for 'Contracts for Difference' and has the advantage of allowing traders to predict the price movement of a stock without owning the underlying asset.
marketSection.commoditiesDesc: In the forex stock market, not only currency combinations and stocks can be traded, but also commodities traded in financial markets such as gold, oil, sugar, and coffee.
marketSection.equityIndicesDesc: Equity Indices' refer to portfolios of stocks of leading companies in a particular market or sector. Examples include the S&P 500, NASDAQ and FTSE 100.
marketSection.metalsDesc: Gold, silver, and platinum are also tradable, and are often traded by traders as supply, demand, geopolitical and economic indicators strongly influence rates.
marketSection.cryptosDesc: Cryptocurrency is a decentralized digital currency that operates independently of central banks and financial institutions, and cryptocurrency trading has become increasingly popular in recent years, allowing many traders to earn high profits

accountDetails.demoDesc: Practice trading with our demo account
accountDetails.standardDesc: Ideal for all traders, beginners and experienced

metaTraderInfo.title: MetaTrader 5
metaTraderInfo.desc: MetaTrader 5 is an updated and improved version of the well-known Metatrader 4, a platform that meets the trading standards of traders. Its advanced charting technology and sophisticated order management tools allow you to monitor and control your positions efficiently. This powerful platform includes brand-new features to take your trading to the next level.

cTrader.title: cTrader
cTrader.desc: cTrader is a moderately new retail trading platform compared to MetaQuotes' platform. This platform is specifically for traders who want the fastest order execution. The advantages of this platform are that it offers you the ability to complete analyzes of your trades, a very easy-to-use user interface, and innovative features.

tradingHours.title: Trading Hour
tradingHours.desc: Forex, stock, and crypto markets are continuously traded 24/7, and all around the world, so you can trade anywhere and anytime.
tradingHours.subTitle: Forex Trading Hours
tradingHours.subDesc: The Forex market is open 24/5 due to the overlapping trading hours of the major stock exchanges, and when one market closes, the other opens. There are 4 main Forex trading markets:

partnerRegister.title: How to register as a PARTNER?
partnerRegister.registerDesc: If you are not registered as a user of MOTFX broker, please register by clicking HERE.
partnerRegister.desc2: Log in with your account and submit a request to become a PARTNER. When sending a request, select the PARTNER menu in the USER DASHBOARD section and click the BECOME PARTNER button to fill in the relevant information.
partnerRegister.desc3: When we accept your request and register as a PARTNER, a registration link will be generated in the PARTNER section of the USER DASHBOARD, which you can share with others.

partnerWithUs.title: Partner With Us
partnerWithUs.part1: If you are looking for a way to help others enter the forex stock market and achieve their financial goals while using the MOTFX broker, we offer you a PARTNER service. By becoming our PARTNER, you will be able to benefit from the trades of each registered user at your request.
partnerWithUs.part2: We will also offer you a variety of marketing tools and other things to help you promote the MOTFX broker to others, which you can use to distribute through your website, social media, and other marketing channels.
partnerWithUs.part3: We will provide detailed reports and other information about users registered as your offer and commission income from time to time.

stepsSection.title: Follow the 4 steps below and start trading within 24 hours.
stepsSection.registerDesc: Click the Start button and follow our easy account setup process
stepsSection.personalInfoDesc: Click the Start button and follow our easy account setup process
stepsSection.depositDesc: Get ready to take advantage of the next trading opportunity
stepsSection.tradeDesc: Open your trading platform and place your first trade with MOTFX

riskWarning.title: Risk warning
riskWarning.description: It should be noted that high leverage trading on Forex and Crypto combinations is not suitable for all traders and they carry some risk to your capital. Before trading, we recommend that you fully understand the risks involved, taking into account your investment goals and experience level, and only trade with funds that you can afford to risk. In no event shall MOTFX be liable to any person or entity in whole or in part for any loss or damage arising out of or in connection with any trading or investment.

startComponent.title: Start trading
startComponent.description: Your account will undergo verification within the next 24 hours.
